0.detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

1.detail_desc: Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

2.detail_desc: Super-oversized jacket in organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, diagonal welt front pockets and tabs with a button at the back of the hem.

3.detail_desc: Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.

4.detail_desc: Blouse with long puff sleeves and gathered elastication to create a gently draped effect at the cuffs. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam with wide smocking at the hem. Unlined.

5.detail_desc: Canvas sandals with a decorative knot at the front, tab with a hook and loop fastener and braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

6.detail_desc: Shirt in soft, checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

7.detail_desc: Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

8.detail_desc: Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.

9.detail_desc: Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

10.detail_desc: T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a wide neckline and tie detail at the front.

11.detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.

12.detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and tapered legs.

13.detail_desc: Cropped top in cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the top and hem and narrow, ribbed shoulder straps.

14.detail_desc: Dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with short frilled sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt.

15.detail_desc: Oversized jumper in a soft, fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.

16.detail_desc: Backpack in woven fabric that can easily double up as a tote bag. Two handles at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps that unclip at the bottom to be stored in the outer compartment at the back. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip at the top, a padded laptop sleeve on the inside, a smaller outer compartment on one short side and a large outer compartment with a zip at the front. Lightly padded base. Size approx. 14x30x43 cm.

17.detail_desc: Shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and back pockets.

18.detail_desc: 3/4-length nylon shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and open back pockets. Low crotch and wide legs with wide elasticated hems.

19.detail_desc: Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

20.detail_desc: Boxy-style jumper in a fine-knit alpaca blend with a round, ribbed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

21.prod_name: CA Hugh Linen shirt TVP R
21.detail_desc: Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

22.detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

23.detail_desc: Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide hem. Light support. Seamless.

24.detail_desc: Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.

25.detail_desc: Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

26.detail_desc: Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with a lace trim at the top and around the legs. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

27.detail_desc: 5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.

28.detail_desc: Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 0.8 cm.

29.detail_desc: Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

30.detail_desc: Platform ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and block heels. Fabric linings and insoles and heavy, chunky soles. Platform front 5.5 cm, heel 12 cm.

31.detail_desc: Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.

32.prod_name: NATE  basic S/S solid tee BB
32.detail_desc: T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

33.detail_desc: Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.

34.detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

35.detail_desc: Small, sturdy handbag in imitation leather with a handle at the top and flap with a metal clasp. Detachable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining.

36.detail_desc: Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

37.detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

38.detail_desc: A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist with ties at the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

39.detail_desc: Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves.

40.detail_desc: Puffer gilet with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, welt front pockets and a rounded hem. Lined.

41.detail_desc: Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

42.detail_desc: Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

43.detail_desc: Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with a round neckline and dropped shoulders.

44.detail_desc: Short, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

45.detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.

46.detail_desc: Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

47.detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

48.detail_desc: Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a square neckline front and back and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

49.detail_desc: T-shirt in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.

50.detail_desc: Belt in a nylon weave with metal D-rings and metal clips at the ends. Width 3.5 cm.

51.detail_desc: Checked Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

52.detail_desc: A-line blouse in woven fabric with an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.

53.detail_desc: 5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and straight legs.

54.detail_desc: Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

55.detail_desc: Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

56.detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. Satin blouse with a long, pointed collar and buttons down the front. Defined shoulders, extra-long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

57.detail_desc: Chinos in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs.

58.detail_desc: High-waisted stretch twill trousers in a cotton blend. Fly with a visible zip, fake front pockets and slim legs.

59.detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

60.detail_desc: Cargo trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.

61.detail_desc: Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.

62.detail_desc: Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

63.detail_desc: Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.

64.detail_desc: Short lace skirt with a concealed zip in the side and box pleats. Lined.

65.detail_desc: Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

66.detail_desc: Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed fastener at the top and ties at the side.

67.detail_desc: Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.

69.detail_desc: Short dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

70.detail_desc: Knitted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Soft, thermal fleece inside.

71.detail_desc: Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.

72.detail_desc: Short, fitted jersey top with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.

73.detail_desc: Shirt in washed denim with worn details, a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

74.detail_desc: Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

75.detail_desc: Denim shirt with a collar, press-studs down the front and short, cut-off sleeves with raw edges. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a rounded hem with split seams.

76.detail_desc: Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

77.detail_desc: Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, narrow frill trim around the elbows and covered elastication at the cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.

78.detail_desc: Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a soft, lightly napped finish. Side pockets, flap back pockets and wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

79.detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.

80.detail_desc: Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.

81.detail_desc: Small bag with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 16x22 cm.

82.detail_desc: Knee-length dress in a fine knit with a slight sheen. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.

83.detail_desc: Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

84.detail_desc: Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.

85.detail_desc: Top in narrow-ribbed jersey with a soft, deep V-neck front and back, short sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked edge at the hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

86.detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

87.detail_desc: Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline, short sleeves and covered, decorative buttons at the front.

88.detail_desc: Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.

89.detail_desc: Shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

90.detail_desc: Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.

91.detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper knitted in soft bouclé yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

92.detail_desc: Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Seam at the waist with a wide tie that creates a draped effect and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.

93.detail_desc: Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.

94.detail_desc: Fully lined swimsuit with a deep, flounce-trimmed, elasticated V-neck front and back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and decorative crossover lacing at the front. High-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

95.detail_desc: Calf-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly, jetted back pockets and slim, straight legs..

96.detail_desc: Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

97.detail_desc: Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.

98.detail_desc: Dress in stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem.

99.detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft, striped jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
